Html:
Hi,

I cannot install the last version of Wsus Package Publisher on Windows Server 2003 Standard Edt.

The error log is:
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM =================================================================================================================
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM Starting. Release : 1.3.1311.24
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM Upgrade Settings : False
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM Windows was installed in : en (English)
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM Entering Void .ctor() : FrmSettings
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM UnhandledException. Something Went Wrong
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM **** Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: item
12/17/2013 8:51:57 AM Entering Void .ctor() : FrmSendDebugInfo
12/17/2013 8:52:07 AM Entering Void lnkLblShowInformations_LinkClicked(System.Object, System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs)

Any suggestion?

Thanks,

A file is probably missing. Is it a first installation ?
Can you download again the zip file.
